inn1.comm: Simmons sets West Indies on their way with a tuck in front of square leg for a single
Gayle pretends to play at that one, playing well inside the line of a delivery outside off
no sixes from Gayle yet, actually he hasn't put bat on ball yet, lets another one through to the keeper
on middle and leg, Gayle twirls that towards point, opens the face of the bat to guide it away for a single
short of length ball outside off and that is left alone by Simmons
a good first over from Mashrafe, not much movement on offer for him, but he was tidy, finishes it off with a back of length ball heading for off stump, solidly defended
a low full toss on the leg stump to start, whipped towards square leg
shortish and outside off, poked towards point by Simmons
well outside off and that is left alone
a hint of swing there, moving away a touch, Simmons looks to drive off the front foot through the off side, he's beaten
too far outside off to worry Simmons, who shoulders arms
defended towards midwicket to end a quiet second over
length ball on the pads, defended down the track, Gayle taking his time early on here, instead of an all-out onslaught
angling across Gayle who again plays inside the line to comfortably let that ball through to the keeper
on off stump, blocked from the crease by Gayle, more defence from Gayle
this time Mashrafe gets it closer to off, Gayle again plays inside the line, looked a little awkward there
Mashrafe keeps it in the channel outside off, Gayle is happy to allow it through to the keeper
end of a maiden, Gayle stands tall and defends towards cover, it's 3/0 after three overs
short of length, defended off the back foot down the track
bangs it in shorter, just outside off, more defence from Simmons
angling in towards off, defended towards extra cover this time
cuts in from a back of a length, pushed towards mid-off by Simmons
a thick edge, past a diving first slip for four, Simmons was looking to drive on the up through the off, down to third man though, they had two slips for the first few overs, but not this one

another false shot, Simmons swivels as he looks to pull a short ball, badly mistimes it, the ball loops up and lands only a few metres away from the batsman, somewhere in the direction of square leg, tentative from Simmons
a repeat of what Mashrafe did in the previous over to Gayle, he angles it across, Gayle lets it go

2 off 11 balls? that didn't seem right to Gayle, who shimmied down the track and launched that length ball towards the sightscreen, more of the Gayle people round the world have come to love, the first six of the game
on the leg stump from Mortaza, Gayle stays in the crease and tickles it to the vacant fine leg for four

Gayle showing how quickly he can change gears, he played out a maiden to Mashrafe in the last over, now it is 6, 4 and 4, on the pads once more, which isn't where you should be bowling when you don't have protection at fine leg, another glance for four
that was outside off, a slower ball that didn't bounce too much, Gayle was a bit put off by that one, leaves it to the keeper
another slower offcutter, Gayle opens the face as he guides it on to the ground and then to slip
angling down the leg side, Simmons looks to work the ball to the leg side but is struck on the pads
length ball outside off, Simmons happy to leave it to the keeper

Bangladesh were absolutely certain Simmons nicked that to the keeper, there was a big sound there, had to be an edge as Simmons looked to flay a short ball towards the leg side, the umpire didn't hear it though, Bangladesh can't believe it
another short ball and that is pulled towards fine leg for a single
a bit of width, Gayle crunches it towards point, but can't find the gap
on leg stump, Gayle get back in his crease, opens the face to steer the ball towards backward point
lashed through covers, that was length ball outside off, Simmons gets his second boundary, powerfully struck
slower offcutter, that was pitched up and outside off, guided towards slip
defended to the off side by Simmons
Simmons shuffles down the track, Mashrafe bowls it shorter and towards Simmons' ribs, Simmons tucks the ball towards square leg
another slower offcutter, Gayle defends towards point
gets well back in the crease, and steers the ball towards deep backward point for a single
shortish ball outside off, Gayle wanted to thwack that through the off side, but that bounced more than he expected, through to the keeper
backs away to make room and slaps that offstump delivery towards mid-off, well stopped by the man at mid-off by Gazi
short and outside off, sliced down towards the third man, another sharp bit of fielding, the bowler applauds
shortish ball outside off, Gayle slaps it to cover, can't beat the fielder there
guided down to third man to end the over
short of length ball on the leg stump, Mashrafe bowling plenty of slower ones, defended by Gayle towards the bowler
length ball on off stump, defended from the crease towards the off side
punched off the back foot towards mid-off by Gayle, generally Mashrafe trying to avoid giving Gayle any room
opens the face and slices the ball towards backward point, quiet over this so far
shorter and outside off, Gayle swings his arms, trying to fiercely send it past extra cover, can't get the gap
two maidens from Mashrafe to Gayle, not something any bowler does often, the final ball of the over is defended towards the bowler

dropped, and that is an appalling miss by Sohag Gazi, a full ball is chipped towards mid-on by Simmons, Jeff Dujon says that is out even before the catch is taken, the ball wasn't travelling too quickly and seemed a regulation catch, put down though, on a flat track, you can't miss those, Hasan has his hands on his knees in frustration
defended to the off side by Gayle
smash! Gayle force, a touch short and Gayle absolutely muscles that over cover for a flat six, Bangladesh can start worrying now
strays on the pads this time, easy piut away down the leg side, four more, Gayle turning it on
four more, a length ball is thumped over extra cover for four, plenty of power on that, and it's 15 off the over with one to go
on the pads, length ball, defended towards midwicket
nudges that for a single
slower one outside off, defended towards backward point

there's the wicket, looked plumb that one, shortish slower one, Simmons had shuffled across and looked to tuck that to the leg side from the crease, he misses and is struck on the knee roll, in front of middle, that would have taken out leg stump, Bangladesh strike
beaten outside off, this was close to the stumps, Bravo fished at it and misses
pushed towards cover off the front foot
short of length ball just outside off, punched towards cover
nope, it's sliding down leg, Gayle wnats to glance that, off the pads to the keeper

Gazi has struck, the massive wicket of Gayle, it was a terrific catch by Tamim Iqbal at long-on, Gayle takes on long-on, but he can't hit it long enough, it was in the slot to be hit though, I thought Tamim was going to miss that one but he pedals back a few steps and leaps to pluck that overhead chance, makes sure he doesn't ground the ball as he lands, gets up and signals that's out, what a start for Gazi
spinning in from short of a length ball, defended towards cover by Samuels
pushed towards cover once more
length ball on the pads, blocked towards the bowler
flighted ball, spinning in, off the pads and through to slip, Bangladesh appeal in hope, the umpire isn't interested
pitched on a length from Mashrafe and that's pushed firmly towards mid-off
shortish on the off, crunched towards mid-on from the crease
slower one bowled short on leg stump, turned towards square leg for a single
angling in towards the off stump, that's defended off the back foot into the off side
dropped it slightly short on middle and it took off to catch him high on the bat as he tried to play it down with his bottom hand off
shortish again and that's knocked behind point off the back foot
slightly short outside off, gets on the back foot and punches it to cover
goodish length with a bit of air, pushes it towards cover, got an inside edge onto the pads there
straighter on middle and leg, drives it down towards long-on for a single
pitches it up and that's driven towards extra cover
Samuels has been caught at slip, drives with a bit more effort this time and gets the outside edge against one that went on straight, thick edge and Mahmudullah took it on the second attempt at slip
pushes him back with a flatter delivery on middle, defended from the crease into the leg side
length ball outside off, guided towards point
watchful defence towards point
gets forward and squeezes it towards square leg
edged towards midwicket off the front foot
a touch short and outside off, Bravo waits on the back foot and slaps that to the backward point boundary
length ball closer to the stumps, defended to the off side by Bravo
blocked from the crease by Pollard
gets forward and sends the ball towards point
Gazi continues to flight the ball, defended to the offside
length ball is nudged towards square leg
gives it some air once more, inviting the drive, Bravo drives, just gets it past short cover
front foot defence to end the over
looking to york Bravo, well outside off, a thick outside edge sends the ball towards point for a single
short ball outside off, Pollard allows it through to the keeper
looks to tuck the ball to the leg side, struck on the thigh pad by that shortish offcutter
well outside off, easy leave for Pollard
down the leg side, a free run for West Indies, Hasan generally keeping it short here
short once more, outside off, Pollard sways just to make sure he's nowhere in line with that, that carries through nicely to the keeper, good carry-through
looks to tuck a shortish ball to the leg side but is struck on the body
on leg stump, Bravo looks to make room, chops the ball towards point
poor ball that, full and down the leg side, Bravo onto that quickly, sweeps it firmly and along the ground to the backward square leg boundary
stands tall as he defends that to the off side
again fired down the leg side, this time Bravo misses it
blocked towards short cover
Gazi keeps giving the ball some air, pushed towards short cover
pitched up and on the legs, flighted ball, driven along the ground towards long-on
confidently struck by Bravo, on the up drive sends the ball towards deep point for a single
looking to drive a full ball towards the off side, a thick inside-edge sends the ball behind square leg
on the middle and leg, blocked from the crease
short of length ball on leg stump, defended
length ball is pushed towards mid-off off the front foot
short of length ball on off stump, worked towards square leg for a single
spins in towards off, back of a length, pushed towards mid-on
length ball outside off, driven towards extra cover
down the leg side and that is wide
length ball outside off, waits on the back foot and guides it down to third man for four
length ball on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
a touch short, spinning down the leg side, defended
beaten outside off as he looks to push that towards cover
length ball strikes the pad outside off as Bravo looks to whip the ball to the leg side
length ball spins in towards off, defended to the leg side
worked towards short midwicket
length ball on middle, clipped to midwicket, a quiet over so far
defended back towards the bowler this time, five dot balls, big hit to come?
nope, it's a maiden as Bravo pokes the final ball towards point
whipped towards deep square leg for a single
gets away with a terrible delivery, that was very short and well outside off, Bravo had to wait for that to arrive, couldn't time his shot
full ball is dismissed by Bravo, launches that towards wide long-on for four
beautiful hit, all the pressure that Bangladesh built up vanishes, a clean swing sends the ball soaring towards the sightscreen for six
thumped towards sweeper cover for two more

rubbish ball gets the treatment, a full toss on the pads, whacked by Bravo to the square leg boundary, the fielder there didn't have too move much to get to that one, but that ball was zipping along, too quick for him
full ball on the pads, nurdled behind square leg
shortish ball outside off, can't connect with that one
driven towards long-on for a single
sliding down the leg side, looks to glance that one but it is off the pad to the keeper, big appeal for caught-behind, not out
Pollard doesn't quite connect as well as he would have liked, launches that long-off, a diving fielder there can't reach that one, through for four

Pollard is gone, to a delivery that he could have hit anywhere he liked, a short one, Pollard pulls, straight to midwicket, the man there didn't need to move, Pollard even had the courtesy of hitting it at a nice catchable height, Bangladesh celebrate, Pollard swings his bat in disgust
short of length ball outside off, slapped towards deep point
spinning in from Mahmuddulah, tucked to midwicket
way down the leg side
shortish ball outside off, Thomas misses

Khulna roars in delight, they sense an upset here, Thomas played that one just behind square leg, there's a massive mix-up, Bravo is stranded halfway, he makes a desperate dash back, it isn't a direct hit, but there is still time to run him out, West Indies 102/5, Bravo had run two-thirds the way before realising Thomas wasn't going anywhere
defended off the front foot towards cover
full ball down the leg side, evades the keeper as well
pushed towards cover
flighted, full ball outside off, driven towards cover
full ball on the stumps, Sammy turns it towards midwicket
cuts that towards backward point
spins away past the outside edge as he looks to defend
nicked, went to the keeper, but impossible to catch that, batsman was looking to chop that one, bottom edged
full ball well outside off, gets forward and thrashes that past the man at cover, there's no sweeper in place which means Sammy gets four
flighted, spinning delivery, Sammy is beaten as he looks to tap the ball towards cover
pushed along the ground towards long-off
defended towards point for a single

spinning in towards the pads, worked towards long-on, the batsmen have plenty of time for two, Mahmudullah is not impressed with the fielding, asking the fielder why he took so long to get the ball back
pushed off the front foot towards extra cover
full ball is driven towards the bowler
drops it short this time, defended towards the bowler
well outside off, slapped towards point
guides that towards sweeper cover
full ball nearly yorks the batsman, pushed towards the bowler to end a quiet over
that short ball kept low, Sammy is taken by surprise, he jabs his bat down in time
poked towards mid-off for a single
forward defense, sends the ball rolling to the off side
length ball on the pads, worked towards square leg, almost another mix-up, Thomas was racing through for a single, Sammy hadn't moved
thumped towards cover for a single
short and spinning down the leg side, worked towards short fine, Nasir Hossain fields smartly
defended to the off side
blocked towards the bowler
keeping it on the stumps, not much turn, but not allowing the batsman any room, more defence
defended towards cover
Razzak keeps it on off stump, not trying anything fancy, neither is the batsman, who blocks
this time Razzak drops it short, ruining a good over, sits up for Thomas to thwack towards midwicket for four

the second superb catch at long-on today, Sammy is gone now, a length ball that Sammy wanted to murder over long-on, again it was a touch opportunity for the man in the deep, Naeem Islam jumps to collect it and lands a yard within the rope, Sammy walks off shaking his head
looks to drive through off and misses
flung int quicker, keeps a touch low, Thomas defends awkwardly
length ball on off, tucked towards square leg
spinning down the leg side, worked behind square leg this time
works the ball towards square leg
full ball on off, looking to defend, may have struck just outside the line
defended towards the bowler

Andre Russell doesn't move his feet at all as he looks to chop the ball from middle and off, that one slides on and diesn't turn away, perhaps the cut was not the best shot to play there, he's cramped and can't get bat on ball, bowled him
blocked towards midwicket
gets well forward and defends
a flighted ball is solidly defended
an outside edge past the keeper towards third man
guides this towards backward point
length ball is turning in, worked towards point
flighted and on middle, Thomas defends it solidly
length ball is guided towards deep point
length ball outside off, bounces a bit, looked to poke that one, and is beaten

another catch at long-on, as soon as the batsman played that the bowler screamed 'Catch' (with about 20 'A's), Thomas stepped out of the crease and thumps that one, but not far enough, the simplest of the takes at long-on today
defended towards cover
sliding down the leg stump, struck on the pads, and there's an appeal, easy decision for the umpire
again on the pads, another mild lbw appeal
length ball on the pads, driven towards long-on for a single
spinning away after pitching short of a length, pushed to the left of the bowler
looks to sweep that, top edge that had short fine interested, but just too wide of him
pushed that flighted ball towards midwicket
length ball on middle and off, defnded
down the leg side, looks to sweep that one, misses
full ball on middle and that is tucked towards midwicket
driven towards the bowler
defended off the front foot towards point
nicely done by Narine, skipping down the track and driving along the ground past the bowler
stays in the crease and defends to the off side
on the pads, pushed back to the bowler
flighted and full, on the pads, squeezed towards midwicket for a single
a full ball on the pads, glanced down to fine leg for four
full toss outside off, guided down to third man for a single
short of length ball just outside off, punched off the back foot towards sweeper cover
whacked towards sweeper cover for a single
slower ball outside off, Rampual chases that wide one but misses
length ball and that is thrashed by Rampaul, flat-batted over mid-on for a six, powerfully struck by Rampaul
just driving along the ground towards long-on for a single
defended towards square leg
defends off the front foot
lashes that one off the back foot through cover for four
length ball is driven towards cover point
played off the back foot, towards extra cover
mild lbw appeal though the ball pitched outside leg and probably even struck outside leg
waits on the back foot and guides the ball towards short third man
full and down the leg side, a gift from Mashrafe, easy for the batsman to tuck that past short fine leg
full ball is driven towards extra cover
short ball, Rampaul looks to work that slower one towards the off side, misses
looks to swipe that ball from outside off, bottom-edge bounces through to the keeper
full ball, batsman yorks himself as he comes down the track, jams that towards square leg, a misfield allows a second
down the leg side
blocked down the track this time
Narine charges out and launches the ball, dribbles to long-on
blocked towards point
looks to sweep that and he misses
lovely hit from Narine,  gets his front leg out of the way, and thumps that over cover off the back foot
not as good a stroke, a leading edge sends the ball over the bowler
length ball on off stump, guided towards backward point, a misfield allows the single
length ball on off stump, pushed towards mid-off
pitched up, and that is clobbered towards deep midwicket, West Indies picking up some valuable runs here
back of a length ball that beats Rampaul outside off, bounces through to the keeper, that seemed to have been the slower one
worked off the back foot in front of point, the partnership swells to 48
solidly defended towards the bowler
on the pads, helped to backward square leg
on the pads once more, again towards backward square leg
defended off the front foot behind point for a single
opens the face, and defends towards point
charges down the track and goes for the big hit, thick inside-edge towards square leg
slides on after pitching just outside off, Rampaul gets his bat down in time
inside-edge as he looks to defend, the ball rolls to the leg side
pushed towards cover this time
full ball is defended carefully towards the keeper
blocked towards cover
four more for West Indies, short ball wide outside off, lashed behind point for four, Sunil Narine making an impact on this tour finally
defended towards the bowler
looks for the big swipe to midwicket, doesn't get hold of it, gets a single for his efforts
outside off and that is beaten
Rampaul looks to sweep that one, he was far too early on the shot, off the gloves and the ball pops up for the keeper, finally the ninth wicket goes down
defended towards the bowler
looks to chop that one and misses
once more a flamboyant backlift, but no contact
looking to drive through the off, thick edge sends it towards the bowler
length ball is blocked towards the bowler
this one turns and gets the edge, wide of the keeper and down towards third man
solid forward defence
short of length ball is blocked towards silly point
flighted and full, worked towards wide mid-on by Roach, who gets his first run
looks for the flamboyant drive, he missed, was he out of the crease when the bails were taken off? nope, he's okay, grounds his back foot just in time
actually, this was a controlled drive towards long-on for a single
length ball is studiously defended
jumps down the track and pushes it towards extra cover
blocked towards the bowler
again makes room, down the track and sends that over cover towards the deep, there might have ben time to take the third but they settle for two
length ball is driven back towards the bowler
length ball on the pads, pushed towards wide mid-on, West Indies move along to 197
spin in, shortish ball, whipped towards midwicket for a single
pushed towards cover
slices the outside-off ball towards backward point
plays with an open face, past the bat and through to the keeper
on middle stump, tucked towards square leg for a single

end of the innings as Narine goes for the sweep and misses, struck in line of middle and leg, and Gazi has his fourth wicket, what a debut it has been for him, 4 for 29, good effort from Narine as well, his career-best score of 36

inn2.comm: Marlon Samuels starts, full ball is blocked towards the bowler
Tamim doesn't mind going for his strokes early, charges down and lofts that between the bowler and mid-off for four
slapped firmly towards cover
defended watchfully this time
sliced towards backward point this time
strikes this towards cover, again not wide enough of the fielder, good positive start by Bangladesh though
short of length to start from Rampaul, helped along to fine leg
short of length ball on off stump, gets behind the line and defends
more watchful defence, short of length ball on leg stump
lovely stroke from Tamim, an on-the-up drive past point, all along the ground, Pollard started to chase it before giving up quickly as he realised he was never going to catch that
blocked towards the off side by Tamim
length ball on off stump, is driven back towards the bowler, Rampaul gets down in time to field that one
Samuels continues, length ball is defended off the front foot
spins down the leg side, that is a wide
defended towards backward point
blocks it down the track
still looking for his first ODI run, tapped towards midwicket
gets forward and defends this time, the good thing for the debutant  is that with the target being so small, he can take his time to find his feet
more defence to end the over
Tmaim Iqbal looked confident, he picks up a couple by working the ball towards midwicket
short of length ball outside off, Tamim raises the bat over his head as he allows the ball through to the keeper
short of length ball on leg stump, blocked towards the leg side
happy to leave that one through to the keeper
length ball on off stump, defended towards mid-on
short of length ball angling away, another leave
that's his first run, flicked towards midwicket for a single
slams that over extra cover for six, imperious hit from Tamim Iqbal, takes a couple of steps down the track and thumps that powerfully, he's in a hurry here
gets on the front foot and taps that towards cover
spins down the leg side
Anamul much more watchful than Tamim, defends from the crease
on the pads, guides it towards short fine leh
edges it towards point
waits on the back foot and guides that towards backward point
pitched up and on the leg stump and that is whipped towards midwicket for four, Tamim has the Khulna crowd on their feet
length ball around off, Tamim blocks
a touch shorter, on middle and leg, looks to whip that to the leg side, struck on the thigh pad
short of length ball heading for off, Tamim gets forward and pats the ball towards mid-on
shot! driven on the up once more, perfectly placed through the cover, Rampaul sprayed that a bit wide of off stump, that was enough for Tamim to scythe it for four
he starts with a wide down the leg side
big appeal for lbw, but only from Roach, Anamul looking tentative against the pace of Roach, caught on the crease as he looked to play that
don't think he has played any bowler of this pace before, he pokes at a ball outside off and is beaten
looks to defend off the back foot, the ball rolls towards slips
another fish outside off, another miss, big gap between bat and pad as he plays that
shorter from Roach and that is angling towards the off stump, Anamul moves across and helps the ball down to fine leg
back of a length ball, solidly defended
looks to flay that through the off side, not much footwork, just swings his bat at it, doesn't get hold of it and the ball dribbles towards slips
a much-needed confidence boost for Anamul, whacks that wide one along the ground for four past point
looking to thrash everything now, inside-edge and the ball rolls behind square leg
short of length ball on middle stump, blocked confidently towards the bowler
short of length ball outside off, a controlled glide sends the ball towards third man
pitched up and that is driven towards mid-on
starts well, a short of length ball, Tamim wanted to muscle that through cover, hit high on the bat and the bottom hand comes off as he plays that, the ball rolls towards cover
slower offcutter from Roach, guided towards gully
Roach back over the wicket, bangs it in, Anamul blocks it from the crease
bowled from wide of the crease, full ball heading for off, defended towards the leg side

short and wide, Anamul gets on top of the bounce and cracks that to the deep backward point boundary, there was an initial roar as he played the shot, and then another when the crowd realises the third man can't get around to stop that
full and on the pads, clipped towards midwicket for a single
length ball is defended to the off side
on the legstump, worked towards square leg
too full from Narine, Anamul growing in confidence here, a lovely drive through cover for four
short of length ball, spins in a hint, defended to the leg side
plenty of turn there from Narine as he pitches it wide of off stump, stabbed towards backward point
drifts this onto the pads, worked towards square leg
Roach tries a bouncer and that is ducked under by the batsman
length ball in middle and off, defended towards the off side

Tamim charges down the track, he doesn't get near the pitch of the ball, slices it towards deep point for four, he was looking more towards cover and he wasn't totally in control but he gets four nonetheless
another short ball, Tamim goes for the hook, bottom-edges it on to his thigh, that's the second bouncer of the over, two allowed now under the new rules
full and outside off, Tamim can't connect with that
shortish again from Roach, helped along to deep backward square leg
length ball on offstump, blocked towards point
drops it short, slapped towards backward point by Tamim
length ball spinning away, defended off the front foot
Narine drops it short once more, this time Tamim doesn't miss out, cracks it past backward point, where the fielder didn't expect the ball to spin away after bouncing
length ball on the pads, eased towards long-on for a couple, Bangladesh 60/0
on the pads, helped down to fine leg for a single
slower bouncer from Roach, Tamim slices that as he looks to pull, wanted to send it towards midwicket but the ball flies towards long-on instead, two more
full ball on middle stump, punched towards mid-on
Tamim looking in great touch here, a short ball is dismissed by Tamim, an authoritative pull to the  midwicket boundary
six this time, and Tamim has raced to his half-century, a touch short and outside off, slashed that in front of point for six, massive power on that shot, Bangladesh running away with this
a low full toss outside off, not too well timed by Tamim but he gets the ball between mid-off and extra cover for four more
flighted ball spins in and pushed off the back foot from cover
full ball outside off, is punched towards cover, Pollard gives chase and gets his foot in the way just before the ball reaches the rope
well outside off, slashed towards sweeper cover
spins in from short of a length, played from within the crease towards square elg
length ball is worked towards square leg
flighted and full, outside off and that is guided towards backward point for a single
short of length ball stays low, Anamul was looking to crash it through the off side, but the ball sneaks under his bat, Anamul once again not too keen on getting forward
again, feet stuck on the crease as he looks to slash the ball through the off side, that was short of a length and just outside off
short from Sammy, Anamul swivels as he gets on top of the bounce and pulls it just behind square leg, does well to keep it along the ground as well
short of length and angling in, pushed through covers for a single
length ball heading for middle, eased towards extra cover off the front foot
a full toss, Sammy lucky to get away with that one, it was asking to be hit, Tamim who has put away some perfectly good deliveries, can only send this one along the ground to long-on for a single

Narine has got the breakthrough! bowling from round the wicket, the ball spins away from Tamim, who looks to power that over backward point, can't beat the man there, easy catch ends the first-wicket stand at 88
shortish again, on the pads, defended
length ball just outside off, blocked from the crease
length ball outside off, wristed towards midwicket for an ambled single
poor ball from Narine, short and spinning down the leg side, Anamul pulls that behind square leg for four
better from Narine, who pitches it up, and Anamul stretches forward to defend
length ball is defended back to the bowlers
full ball outside off, opens the face to guide the ball towards point
worked behind square leg for a single
short of length ball angling in, just outside off, Anamul looks to squeeze that towards cover and is beaten
length ball on middle and leg, pushed towards midwicket
on middle stump again, defended towards midwicket
length ball on the pads, whipped towards deep midwicket for a couple
length ball is driven towards extra cover
short of length ball on off stump, pushed towards extra cover, a quick single is taken, there's a direct hit but the batsman has made it
low full toss outside off, driven towards mid-off for a quick single
length ball outside off, outside off, guided towards backward point
short of length ball, on middle stump, worked to the leg side
length ball is pushed towards extra cover
length ball outside off, Anamul has missed plenty of these, once again he looks to slash towards point and misses
length ball sliding in towards the pads, looks to nudge it, but its off the pads behind square leg
a big roar from the crowd as the Bangladesh 100 comes up, with a push towards cover for a single
beaten as he looks to punch the ball through the off side
short of length, heading for off stump, blocked by Anamul
length ball is turned towards backward point
overpitched and just outside off, driven off the front foot through extra cover for four
defended back towards the bowler
more defence, this time to the right of the bowler
eased towards long-on for a single
all too easy for Bangladesh as of now, pushed towards extra cover this time
slightly fuller from Sammy, crisply driven towards extra cover and a quick single is taken
Naeem prods the ball towards point
full and wide, batsman can't resists swinging at that, he misses
length ball on off and middle, blocked back towards the bowler
angling in towards off stump, Sammy keeps it steady, inside-edge behind square leg
flatter and quicker, on middle, worked towards the leg side
length ball is defended to the leg side
gets on the back foot and blocks that outside off ball towards cover
whipped towards square leg this time
spinning in from a length outside off, more defence from Naeem, Bangladesh have loads of time
shorter this time, thumped towards cover off the back foot, no run and that is a maiden from Narine
full ball outside off, beaten as he looks to drive
pitched up and outside off, driven off the front foot towards cover
it was outside off, and a touch full, Anamul thumps that over mid-on for four, he's not bothered about the line of that delivery
Bangladesh lose their second, Anamul looks to pull a shortish ball, gets a top edge and the ball lobs to wait Sammy, end of a good debut innings from Anamul
defend in front of point
length ball is driven towards sweeper cover for a single, Russell fields
turning in towards the off stump, defended to the off side
again Narine gets the ball to spin in, worked towards backward point
dropped it short, Nasir can't capitalise
Narine oversteps, and then he is whacked over mid-on for four, five valuable runs
no run off the free-hit, a full ball is whipped towards mid-on, but not past the fielder
a bit short and outside off, Nasir stays on the back foot and cuts that behind point for four, nicely done that
pushed towards mid-on to end the over
short of length ball is glided towards third man for a single
length ball outside off, guides it towards third man
length ball is pushed towards cover
pitched up and that is worked back towards the bowler
punched towards mid-off off the back foot
short of length and slides on towards the pad, clipped towards midwicket where a misfield allows them a couple, Narine lets the ball through his legs
Russell starts with a shortish ball on off stump, defended
slips that down the leg side, Bangladesh are 72 away now
full and slanting into the pads, clipped in front of square leg
short of length ball, heading for middle, worked towards midwicket
on middle stump, helped along towards fine leg for a single, easy for Bangladesh
short ball, on the stumps, batsman ducks under early
short of length ball angling down the leg side
worked towards deep backward point, sprints the first so he has time for the second
pitched up on middle and leg, pushed  towards the bowler
a direct hit, third umpire called in, again the Bangladesh batsman is in, that was pushed towards mid-off, Simmons was quickly onto the ball
back of a length, on middle stump, defended to the leg side
pitched up and outside off, the timing is awry, pushed towards mid-off for a single
short of length and just outside off, guided towards backward point
straight driven, just out of the reach of Andre Russell and that runs away for four, Bangladesh 62 away
a bouncer on middle and leg, Naeem ducks easily under that
another bouncer, again the batsman is unruffled
back of a length ball on off stump, defended towards the off side, a direct hit at the non-striker's end from Pollard, the ball ricochets away and allows a single
blocked off the front foot
full toss on the pads, easy for Nasir who whips that to the backward square leg boundary, Bangladesh cruising here
the runs keep flowing, pitched up outside off, leans forward and drives that through extra cover for a boundary
pitched up again but not much width as the previous one, pushed through the line to mid-off
angling in towards the off, rocks on the back foot and defends it with an open face to point
angling in towards middle, pushes it back towards the bowler
through the gap again, there is a deep cover in place, that's driven through the in-field and he runs across to cut it off
short of a good length on the off, rocked back and punched it to extra cover
angling in towards middle, rocks on the back foot and knocks it down into the off side
shortish outside off, runs that down towards third man for a single, opened the face at the last moment
drops that one short on middle and he ducks under it well
shortish on middle and leg, knocks that one down into the leg side in front of the bowler
shortish outside off and he slaps that one towards point
drives that one through towards mid-off
pushed it on a length outside off and that's just played towards extra cover
shortish on middle and leg and that's been turned down to fine leg for a single
short and wide and he chases that one, aiming to slash it through point, misses
cracks that on the up towards deep point for one more
pitched up and he opens the face slightly, square-drives that through to deep point for a single
just fell short of the mid-on fielder charging in, angling in towards middle and that's just chipped in front of him
drops that one short on leg stump and he comfortably ducks under that one
superbly struck, fierce square cut, short and wide and he slashes that wide of point, third man in the deep had no chance
he's gone, a soft dismissal, goodish length and he opened the face to just chip it towards Pollard at point, the easiest of catches and Nasir's gone for a well-made cameo
slanting down the leg side, helped along to the fine-leg boundary for four
terrific bouncer to respond, batsman wasn't sure whether to play those or duck, he jumps and then ducks, safely negotiated anyway
an appeal for lbw, the umpire isn't impressed
short and wide, that is hammered towards the backward point boundary for four, Raoch has his hand on his forehead, telling himself to not bowl short and wide
length ball is defended to the off side
short of length ball, defended off the back foot
pushed off the front foot towards mid-off
slower length ball is clubbed down the ground for four, eight off the over now, and Khulna is readying for a giant party
pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
blocked towards point, Naeem wants one, 'WAIT," screams Mushfiqur, and Naeem turns back
slanting in towards the pads, whipped towards deep square leg
back of length ball just outside off, defended off the front foot to the left of the bowler
down the leg side, far too many extras from West Indies today
defended by Mushfiqur
short of length ball, looks to defend, inside-edge on to his boot
back of a length and on offstump, defended back towards the bowler
slower ball to start, cuts in, slapped towards sweeper cover
short and just outside off, poked towards gully
a bouncer from Rampaul, Mushfiqur is discomfited by that one, wanted to play that one but it got bigger than he expected
another short one, nice bounce for Rampaul, Mushfiqur looks to cut that and is beaten
short of length ball outside off, guided down to third man for a single
once again third man has work to do, helped down fine for one more
short of length and outside off, bottom-edges it to left of the bowler
back of a length ball on off stump, defended to the off side
turned towards deep backward square leg for a single
pushed towards cover off the front foot
short and wide, slapped towards cover by Mushfiqur
a bouncer on the stumps, batsman ducks under
shortish and wide, slaps it towards backward point
worked behind square leg for a single
attempts the pull, miscues it and it lands between the keeper and square leg, lucky escape for Mushfiqur
angling in towards the pads, tucked towards midwicket
slanting in towards the off stump, blocked towards the bowler
outside off and that is left alone, Bangladesh in no hurry here to reach the finish line
length ball is blocked to the right of the non-striker
short of length and outside off, whacked behind point for four, again giving the Bangladesh batsmen too much width
bouncer just outside off, easily evaded by the batsman
length ball is dabbed towards cover
pitched up and that is driven towards cover off the front foot
almost played at that outside off ball, withdraws the bat at the last instant
length ball heading for off stump, defended
short and outside off, eased towards sweeper cover
drives it towards mid-off
West Indies have offered far too many short balls this innings, this one is put away towards midwicket for four
on the pads, and that is sent down towards fine leg, 11 to go
short and a bit of width, guided down to the third-man boundary for four
Narine starts his spell with a length ball on off stump
blocked towards the leg side
more defence, no rush from Bangladesh
eased towards mid-on for a single
on the pads, another single, this time to square leg
worked towards square leg for one more
a 50 for Naeem Islam, pushes the ball towards sweeper cover for another single, he has been unruffled all of today

it's over, Bangladesh have thumped West Indies in the opening game, Mushfiqur finishes it off with a pull for four, plenty of beaming faces in the crowd, the Bangladesh players are fairly composed though, a hug before shaking hands with some of the West Indies players, Mushfiqur walks off chatting with Marlon Samuels
